This appears to be the location of the murder
TBD
A red kerchief has been left behind
Is this the murder weapon?
'A red kerchief! This looks just like the ones worn by the Lake-town Smugglers!'
'With Captain Álarr's blessing, we have access to the murder location! We should make our way there.'
A mysterious patch of rust coats the ground

'[placeholder]? Captain Álarr instructed us to let you investigate the area. You may look, but please do not touch anything. This is where we found the Master last night. We believe the murderer was hiding behind that crate, pushed the Master against the wall, and stabbed him with that knife. Let us know if you find anything worthwhile.'
'That must be the murder weapon. Seems pretty ornate for a common thief....'
Captain Álarr has allowed you access to the location of the murder. Join Mervárth in investigating the Master's murder!
'Rust? No, I don't know anything about the rust. But Mervárth thinks the red kerchief belongs to the Lake-town Smugglers? That is an important piece of information! I will let Captain Álarr know.'
TBD
The location of the murder can be found somewhere in central Lake-town.\n\nYou should investigate the murder location.
'Well, that was certainly illuminating. It appears our Master was murdered by the Lake-town Smugglers!'
The Site of the Murder
